CXLLogicalDevice.description: The schema definition for the CXLLogicalDevice resource.  It represents the properties of a CXL logical device within PCIe device.
CXLLogicalDevice.longDescription: This resource shall represent a CXL logical device that is a part of PCIe device.

title: #CXLLogicalDevice.CXLLogicalDevice
